faq_items.q1: Is this ePub reader free to use?
faq_items.a1: Yes, absolutely! Our online ePub reader is completely free to use with no hidden costs or subscriptions.
faq_items.a2: Your privacy is our top priority. The ePub file you select is processed directly in your browser. It is never uploaded to our servers, ensuring your files remain completely private and secure on your device.
faq_items.q3: What devices can I use this on?
faq_items.a3: Our ePub reader is a web-based application, which means it works on any device with a modern web browser, including desktops (Windows, Mac, Linux), tablets (iPad, Android), and smartphones (iPhone, Android).
faq_items.a4: Currently, our reader requires an internet connection to load the initial page. However, once a book is loaded, you can continue reading it as long as you keep the browser tab open, even if your connection drops. We are working on full offline capabilities.
faq_items.a5: We specialize in the .epub format, which is the most widely supported e-book format. We do not currently support other formats like .mobi, .azw, or .pdf.
faq_items.q6: How do I save my reading progress?
faq_items.a6: The reader automatically remembers your last reading position within a book for as long as you keep the browser tab open. For cross-session progress saving, we recommend bookmarking the page, though full bookmarking features are on our roadmap.
faq_items.q7: Can I customize the reading appearance?
faq_items.a7: Yes! The settings menu allows you to change the font size, line height, and switch between single or two-page layouts to create a reading experience that is most comfortable for you.
